languages.text: "Бить перестали, а толку-то? Сейчас они сдерживаются, так после при инспекциях отсеков отыграются..."
"So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."
languages.original_text: "Бить перестали, а толку-то? Сейчас они сдерживаются, так после при инспекциях отсеков отыграются..."

traits.locale_text: "So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but then they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them..."
"So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."

"So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back while the Lord Captain's here, but after the investigation's done, they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."
"So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but then they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them..."
"So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."
"So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."
"So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."

languages.text: «Las palizas han cesado, ¿y qué más? Ahora se reprimen, pero luego vendrán a indagar a los compartimentos y entonces a ver quién los detiene...».
languages.original_text: "So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."

traits.locale_text: «Las palizas han cesado, ¿y qué más? Ahora se reprimen, pero luego vendrán a indagar a los compartimentos y entonces a ver quién los detiene...».

languages.text: 「それで、彼らはあなたを打ちのめすのを止めたのか？今は我慢しているが、後でコンパートメントを検査しに来た時には、さすがに止められないだろう…」
languages.original_text: "So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."

traits.locale_text: 「それで、彼らはあなたを打ちのめすのを止めたのか？今は我慢しているが、後でコンパートメントを検査しに来た時には、さすがに止められないだろう…」

languages.text: “也就是说，他们现在不打你了，可那又怎么样？他们现在确实不会动手，但用不了多久，他们就会来检查我们的住处。到时候，谁都拦不住他们……”
languages.original_text: "So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，他们现在不打你了，可那又怎么样？他们现在确实不会动手，但用不了多久，他们就会来检查我们的住处。到时候，谁都拦不住他们……”

languages.text: "Sie verprügeln euch also nicht mehr, und jetzt? Sie halten sich zurück, aber später werden sie die Module inspizieren und dann wird sie niemand aufhalten ..."
languages.original_text: "So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."

traits.locale_text: "Sie verprügeln euch also nicht mehr, und jetzt? Sie halten sich zurück, aber später werden sie die Module inspizieren und dann wird sie niemand aufhalten ..."

languages.text: « Alors, ils ont arrêté de tabasser les gens ? La belle affaire ! Ils font mine de se tenir à carreau pour l'instant, mais plus tard, quand viendra la prochaine inspection des compartiments, je parie qu'ils s'en donneront à cœur joie... »
languages.original_text: "So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, ils ont arrêté de tabasser les gens ? La belle affaire ! Ils font mine de se tenir à carreau pour l'instant, mais plus tard, quand viendra la prochaine inspection des compartiments, je parie qu'ils s'en donneront à cœur joie... »

languages.text: "Seni dövmeyi bıraktılar da ne oldu? Şimdilik kendilerini zapt ediyorlar. Eninde sonunda kompartımanları incelemeye gelecekler. O zaman onları kimse durduramayacak..."
languages.original_text: "So they've stopped thrashing you, and what? They're holding back now, but later they'll come inspecting the compartments and there'll be no stopping them then..."
